# BMParts Architecture Overview
# Generated by Copilot
# Updated: 2025-12-26

## Stock/Pricing Flow
```
Spares to Africa → BMParts → WooCommerce
     (import)       (retail)    (ecom)
```

## Automations
- **Zoho Flow** - workflow triggers
- **Ubuntu services** - systemd-managed background processes

## Memory Stack
| Service | Port | Purpose |
|---------|------|---------|
| Qdrant | 6333 | Vector DB |
| gpt-memory | 8000 | Vector memory server |
| memory-mcp | 9092 | MCP bridge for Copilot |

## Reverse Proxy
- **nginx** fronting internal services
- External → nginx → internal service ports
